announcements.title: Slime Impact 2D!
body: - Player no longer dies when Ifa dies due to Geo Shield
- Ghost Bomb now explodes when touching certain objects
- Mouse no longer locks after going to the menu
- Anemo burst now boosts the player horizontally
- Ghost Bomb now affects Lucifer and minions
- Slime King no longer gets stuck on cage
- Attack hitboxes no longer trigger unintended objects
- Screen no longer goes black after Nod-Krai teleport
- Options menu no longer appears behind UI
- Mission text from dialogue no longer appears oversized

announcements.title: Cubo v0.2.6
body: - Gump Rock now has increased health and improved movement speed
- Time Dialled state should now work reliably
- Adjusted background colors to feel more distant and less visually distracting
- Fixed a bounce mushroom that was slightly misaligned
- Added back the missing fade in the main menu

announcements.title: Everdew
body: - Added the highly requested save and load system
- Options can now be adjusted directly from the main menu
- Slightly refined overall UI colors for better readability and style
- Removed tooltips due to a UI-related issue (will be revisited in a future update)
If there are any bugs please write them down in the comments :)
